testcase.name: Send a POST request for a given tenant Id to search for the location details
testcase.system-out: * def jsUtils = read('classpath:com/egov/utils/jsUtils.js') ............... passed * def locationPayload = read('../../core-services/requestPayload/location/searchLocation.json') . passed * def locationConstant = read('../../core-services/constants/location.yaml') . passed * def commonConstants = read('../../common-services/constants/genericConstants.yaml') . passed * def hierarchyTypeCode = mdmsCityEgovLocation.TenantBoundary[0].hierarchyType.code . passed * def boundaryType = mdmsCityEgovLocation.TenantBoundary[0].boundary.children[0].children[0].children[0].label . passed * call read('../../core-services/pretests/location.feature@searchLocationSuccessfully') . passed * match searchLocationResponseBody == '#present' .......................... passed

testcase.name: Search for location details without tenantId
testcase.system-out: * def jsUtils = read('classpath:com/egov/utils/jsUtils.js') ............... passed * def locationPayload = read('../../core-services/requestPayload/location/searchLocation.json') . passed * def locationConstant = read('../../core-services/constants/location.yaml') . passed * def commonConstants = read('../../common-services/constants/genericConstants.yaml') . passed * def hierarchyTypeCode = mdmsCityEgovLocation.TenantBoundary[0].hierarchyType.code . passed * def boundaryType = mdmsCityEgovLocation.TenantBoundary[0].boundary.children[0].children[0].children[0].label . passed * call read('../../core-services/pretests/location.feature@searchLocationSuccessfully') . passed * match searchLocationResponseBody == '#present' .......................... passed * def jsUtils = read('classpath:com/egov/utils/jsUtils.js') ............... passed * def locationPayload = read('../../core-services/requestPayload/location/searchLocation.json') . passed * def locationConstant = read('../../core-services/constants/location.yaml') . passed * def commonConstants = read('../../common-services/constants/genericConstants.yaml') . passed * def hierarchyTypeCode = mdmsCityEgovLocation.TenantBoundary[0].hierarchyType.code . passed * def boundaryType = mdmsCityEgovLocation.TenantBoundary[0].boundary.children[0].children[0].children[0].label . passed * call read('../../core-services/pretests/location.feature@searchLocationWithoutTenantIdError') . passed * assert searchLocationResponseBody.Errors[0].message == locationConstant.errorMessages.noTenantId . passed
